contacts_preview_text: Is there something you don't understand? Did you want to help those in need? If you have any questions, please contact us
contacts_partnerships_description: If you want to become our partner, welcome
contacts_suggestion_description: Would you like to suggest an idea or an improvement of our wonderful service
send_message_text: Dear virtue, I ask you to ask any questions of interest. You will receive the answer in your email as quickly as possible. And thank you for your kindness. Strength is in unity.
name: Name
subject: Subject

category.childDesc: You can't put nature on hold. Environmental work is a complex, continuous and very long process. It cannot be stopped, so as not to “roll back” several decades ago. A healthy ecosystem is the foundation of our existence, and preserving nature is vital for us and future generations.
